subject: Web3
title: Minting an NFT
description: A fast breakdown of Minting an NFT for builders.

hook.text: Minting is the process of creating an NFT on a blockchain. Anyone with a wallet and some crypto can do it.

buildup.text: You upload a file, add a title and description, choose a blockchain, and pay a gas fee. That's it.

discovery.text: Once minted, the NFT exists permanently on the blockchain. It can be sold, gifted, or held forever.

twist.text: The low barrier meant millions of NFTs were minted. Most will never sell. The supply overwhelmed demand.

climax.text: Minting democratized digital creation. Anyone could publish and sell digital work without a gallery or label.

punchline.text: Anyone can mint an NFT. The hard part is finding a buyer.

quiz.question: What does 'minting' an NFT mean?
options: Creating a new NFT on a blockchain
